title: Computation Offloading in 5G Core Networks for Delay-Sensitive Apps

abstract.description: Research on offloading computation in 5G networks for highly delay-sensitive applications.

detail.context: Delay-sensitive apps require optimizing computation placement in 5G networks to reduce latency.
detail.approach: Modeled computation offloading strategies and evaluated them through simulations.
detail.solution_description: Proposed an offloading framework to improve latency performance in 5G cores.
detail.pros: Scientific contribution, published in IEEE conference.
detail.cons_and_improvements_ideas: Needs experimental validation in real network environments.
